p.s: Description of Haloferula phyci sp. nov.
Haloferula phyci (phy′ci. L. gen. n. phyci of a sea-weed).
Exhibits the following properties in addition to those given in the genus description.
Cells are 0.8–1.0 μm in width and 1.2–1.5 μm in length.
Neither cellular gliding movement nor swarming growth is observed.
Colonies grown on 1/5-strength MA medium are circular, convex and pale-orange in colour.
No growth occurs at either 4 or 45 °C.
NaCl is required for growth and can be tolerated up to 5 % (w/v).

Alkaline phosphatase, acid phosphatase and β-galactosidase are positive, but esterase lipase (C8), naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase, esterase (C4), leucine arylamidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, α-galactosidase, α-glucosidase, valine arylamidase, trypsin, lipase (C4), cystine arylamidase, chymotrypsin, β-glucuronidase, β-glucosidase, α-mannosidase and α-fucosidase are negative.

l-Arabinose, d-fructose, d-galactose, d-glucose, d-lactose, maltose, melibiose, d-psicose, raffinose, acetic acid, α-ketobutyric acid, α-ketoglutaric acid, succinic acid, succinamic acid, l-ornithine, inosine and dl-α-glycerol phosphate are oxidized, but dextrin, lactulose, d-mannitol, d-mannose, furanose, d-galacturonic acid, dl-carnitine, γ-aminobutyric acid, uridine, thymidine, 2,3-butanediol, glycerol, l-fucose, cis-aconitic acid, citric acid, glucose 1-phosphate, glucose 6-phosphate, cyclodextrin, glycogen, Tween 40, Tween 80, N-acetyl-d-galactosamine, N-acetyl-d-glucosamine, adonitol, d-arabitol, cellobiose, i-erythritol, gentiobiose, myo-inositol, methyl β-d-glucoside, l-rhamnose, d-sorbitol, sucrose, trehalose, xylitol, pyruvic acid methyl ester, succinic acid monomethyl ester, formic acid, d-galactonic acid lactone, d-gluconic acid, d-glucosaminic acid, d-glucuronic acid, α-hydroxybutyric acid, β-hydroxybutyric acid, γ-hydroxybutyric acid, p-hydroxyphenylacetic acid, itaconic acid, α-ketovaleric acid, dl-lactic acid, malonic acid, propionic acid, quinic acid, d-saccharic acid, sebacic acid, bromosuccinic acid, glucuronamide, alaninamide, d-alanine, l-alanine, l-alanyl glycine, l-asparagine, l-aspartic acid, l-glutamic acid, glycyl l-aspartic acid, glycyl l-glutamic acid, l-histidine, hydroxy-l-proline, l-leucine, l-phenylalanine, l-proline, l-pyroglutamic acid, d-serine, l-serine, l-threonine, urocanic acid, phenylethylamine, putrescine and 2-aminoethanol are not oxidized.
Cell wall peptidoglycan contains muramic acid and meso-diaminopimelic acid.
Major fatty acid components (>1.0 %) include C15 : 0, C16 : 0, C17 : 0, C16 : 1ω9c, iso-C14 : 0, iso-C16 : 0 and anteiso-C15 : 0.
The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 64.3 mol%.
The type strain, AK18-024T (=MBIC08341T=KCTC 22200T), was isolated from marine algae.
